Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Hotel \Ho*tel"\, n. [F. h[^o]tel, OF. hostel. See {Hostel}.] 1. A house for entertaining strangers or travelers; an inn or public house, of the better class. [1913 Webster]
2. In France, the mansion or town residence of a person of rank or wealth. [1913 Webster]
hotel n : a building where travelers can pay for lodging and meals and other services
